Class LocalizerFactoryImpl.LocalizerResourceBundleControl

      architecture.common.i18n.impl.LocalizerFactoryImpl.LocalizerResourceBundleControl
Enclosing class:
LocalizerFactoryImpl
private static class LocalizerFactoryImpl.LocalizerResourceBundleControl
extends ResourceBundle.Control

private static class LocalizerResourceBundle extends ListResourceBundle implements Serializable { private Locale locale = null; private Object contents[][]; protected LocalizerResourceBundle(Map newKeyValues) { contents = new Object[newKeyValues.size()][2]; int index = 0; for(Object key:newKeyValues.keySet()){ contents[index][0] = key; contents[index][1] = newKeyValues.get(key); index++; } } public Object[][] getContents() { return contents; } public Locale getLocale() { if(locale != null) return locale; return super.getLocale(); } }
